product_name: Kelty TraiLogic SB 41 Sleeping Bag - Women's
long_description: At 1 lb. 8 oz.., the lightweight, technical women's Kelty TraiLogic(TM) SB 41 Sleeping Bag offers 800-fill DriDown(TM) to help ward off moisture and stay warm on warm-weather backpacking trips. With a European Norm (EN) comfort rating of 41degF, the SB 41 is suitable for 3-season backpacking in warm weather. High-quality 800-fill-power DriDown down insulation fends off moisture to help maintain warmth. Waterproof fabric at the head and feet is positioned to keep you from feeling the effects of condensation on tent walls. Draft tube backs the 60-in. 2-way zipper to keep cold air out; antisnag design keeps the zipper from catching on the fabric. Kelty TraiLogic SB 41 Sleeping Bag comes with a storage bag and stuff sack. European Norm (EN) is an independent third-party temperature rating, allowing accurate comparisons across brands with other EN-rated bags.
short_description: At 1 lb. 8 oz.., the lightweight, technical women's Kelty TraiLogic(TM) SB 41 Sleeping Bag offers 800-fill DriDown(TM) to help ward off moisture and stay warm on warm-weather backpacking trips.
